Package fun.connor.lighter.compiler.validation

Provides the compile-time validation API for writing errors and validators

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Printable
    Printable objects can be properly printed to the compiler log
    Validatable
    Interface for objects which are capable of being validated
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocationHint
    A location hint used for mapping messages to location in Java source code.
    ReportPrinter
    Prints formatted ValidationReport to the Messager.
    ValidationError
    An individual validation error.
    ValidationReport
    Validation reports are used to provide compiler errors to the user.
    ValidationReport.Builder
    Handles creation of reports from errors and sub-reports.

Package fun.connor.lighter.compiler.validation Description

Provides the compile-time validation API for writing errors and validators
